title: How to let the police know your family member has a mental disability - Quora

response.answer_text: Tell them. If you call 911 about something going on the with a loved one, give them as much info as possible. Make sure they have your cell number if they have questions. If you have a local NAMI chapter, get involved with them. Where I worked, NAMI worked closely with our police deprtment's training division on Crisis Intervention Training. They may have better ideas for your local area. Understand, cops aren't there to hurt people if they can avoid it, but their first priority is safety. Then they work on desescalation and problem solving. NAMI: National Alliance on Mental Illness
